H0.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Oystercatcher

H1.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Sandpiper

H2.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Avocet

H3.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Plover

A4.text: The bird family Charadriidae includes the plovers, dotterels, and lapwings.

A5.text: In general, larger, broader-winged species have often been called lapwings, and the smaller, narrower-winged species plovers or dotterels.
